author: UltPanda
install_msg: The One Piece themed info command has been installed! Use `[p]onepiece_info` to see it in action.
name: OnePieceInfo
short: Provides a One Piece themed info command.
description: This cog adds a new `onepiece_info` command that displays server information with a One Piece theme.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store any data or metadata about users.
